FuncDef:
The guard-timer command sets the Guard timer of an ERPS ring.
The undo guard-timer command restores the default value of the Guard timer. The guard-timer command sets the Guard timer of an ERPS ring. The undo guard-timer command restores the default value of the Guard timer. By default, the Guard timer is 200 centiseconds for the ERPS ring. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the value of the Guard timer for the ERPS ring.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 200, in centiseconds.
